price: Da li su oni nebesa i Zemlju stvorili?! Ne, nego oni nisu uvjereni!
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
